content.rendered:
Need help finding a settlement worker post-arrival? Contact out Settlement Support Connection Team! Find more information on this page.

Please find service directories according to province below.

Finding Newcomer Services is a website tool that provides information on community and government services according to nearest city. It is provided by Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada.

Browse by province: AB | BC | MB | NB | NFL | NS | ON | PEI | SK

ALBERTA

  • Inform Alberta provides information about services in Alberta.
  • 211 Alberta is a directory of community, social and government services in Edmonton, Calgary and several other localities in Alberta.
  • Service Canada locations in Alberta.

Return to top

BRITISH COLUMBIA

  • BC211 provides information about – and referral to community, social and government services in the Metro Vancouver, Fraser Valley and Squamish-Lillooet Regional Districts. Dial 211 in the BC Lower Mainland.
  • Service Canada locations in British Columbia.
  • Welcome BC : Find Settlement Services
  • New to BC: Library Link

Return to top

MANITOBA

  • Resources for Residents is an online tool on the provincial government website that provides information about government services.
  • Service Canada locations in Manitoba.

Return to top

NEW BRUNSWICK

  • Service Canada locations in New Brunswick.
  • New Brunswick Community Services Database is an online database where you can search for community, government and social service programs and organizations.
  • New Brunswick immigration portal provides resource guides which contain listings of settlement and other immigrant serving agencies.

Return to top

NEWFOUNDLAND & LABRADOR

  • Service Canada locations in Newfoundland and the Labrador.
  • The Association for New Canadians (ANC) can provide information about services in Newfoundland and Labrador.

Return to top

NOVA SCOTIA

  • Nova Scotia Immigration provides a listing of services and organizations that help with settlement and integration.
  • Help for Refugees in Halifax has a portal with information on the special Welcomed in Halifax pass for refugees.
  • Service Canada locations in Nova Scotia.
  • 211 Nova Scotia is a site that helps you find the right community and social services in Nova Scotia.

Return to top

ONTARIO

  • Settlement.Org provides information and resources to newcomers to Ontario.
  • 211 Ontario is an information and referral service that provides on community and social service organizations in Ontario, including settlement services. 211 Ontario can also be reached by calling 211.
  • Service Canada locations in Ontario.

Return to top

PRINCE EDWARD ISLAND

  • The PEI Association for Newcomers to Canada can provide information about settlement services and support on PEI.
  • Service Canada locations in P.E.I.

Return to top

SASKATCHEWAN

  • Regional Newcomer Gateways are welcome centers for newcomers arriving in Saskatchewan. They can help in finding needed services, programs and organizations.
  • Service Canada locations in Saskatchewan
  • 211 Saskatchewan has a database of over 5,000 community, social, non-clinical health and government services across the province. Phone help available in over 175 languages.

Return to top
